attributes.action: Have a statue of George Harrison erected on Mathew Street ,Liverpool
attributes.background: John  Lennon has one ,Cilla Black has one,George passed in 2001 and has not been recognised with a statue in this popular Bealtes related tourist area

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding whether to put up statues in Liverpool.

You could make this suggestion to Liverpool City Council:

http://councillors.liverpool.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
